greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of an irregular triangle read by rows in which row n lists the next A026741(n+1) natural numbers A000027.
comment: The integers in same rows of the source triangle have a property related to Euler's Pentagonal Theorem.
Note that the column 1 of the mentioned triangle gives the positive terms of A001318 (see example).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,4,0,-6,0,4,0,-1).
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 21 2011
